info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 19 at 2:51PM CDT until May 22 at 9:54AM CDT by NWS Tulsa OK
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma...
Poteau River near Poteau affecting Le Flore County.
...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Oklahoma...
Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Poteau River near Panama.
* WHEN...From late tonight to late Thursday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, extensive flooding of crop and pasturelands occur between Shady Point and Arkoma. Many roads in the floodplain become impassable.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 38.0 feet late Tuesday night. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. This crest is based on the forecast of heavy rainfall over the next 12 hours. Continue to closely monitor later updates to this river forecast. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING
